LuaScriptable
ScriptableObject
public abstract
LuaScriptable

An abstract class that provides Lua scriptable functionality and loading for ScriptableObjects.

Variables
Name
public string Name

The name of the Lua scriptable object.

Properties
ScriptableTypeName
public virtual string ScriptableTypeName { get }

Returns the name of the derived class without the "Scriptable" suffix.

Variables
DirectoryPath
protected string DirectoryPath {
get
}

The path to the directory where the scriptable objects are stored.

Properties
DeclaredFunctions
protected virtual string[] DeclaredFunctions { get }

Returns an array of declared function names; these will be used for templating the Lua script of the subclass of this class.

Variables
Script
public Script Script

The Lua script associated with this scriptable object.

Functions
AsCoroutine
public IEnumerator AsCoroutine(
string functionName,
params object[] data
)

Calls a Lua function as a coroutine, allowing seamless nesting of Lua and Unity coroutines.

Parameters
functionName
string

the name of the Lua function to be called

data
params object[]

the data to be passed to the Lua function

Table dataTable

CreateArrayFromTableRecursively
private Array CreateArrayFromTableRecursively(
Table luaTable,
Type elementType
)

Creates a C# array from a Lua table, handling nested arrays recursively.

Parameters
luaTable
Table

The Lua table to convert to an array.

elementType
Type

The type of the elements in the resulting array.

Returns

A C# array created from the given Lua table.

ConvertLuaValueToType
private object ConvertLuaValueToType(
DynValue luaValue,
Type targetType
)

Converts a DynValue (MoonSharp representation of a Lua value) to the specified target type.

Parameters
luaValue
DynValue

The MoonSharp DynValue to convert.

targetType
Type

The target type to convert the DynValue to.

Returns

An object of the targetType, created from the given DynValue.

Variables
arrayScrollPositions
private Dictionary<FieldInfo, Vector2> arrayScrollPositions

A dictionary that maps array FieldInfo objects to their corresponding scroll positions in the GUI.

Functions
OnGUI
public bool OnGUI()

Handles drawing the GUI elements and returns true if the Lua script file is successfully created and opened, false otherwise.

DrawField
private void DrawField(
FieldInfo field,
bool label =  true
)

Draws the GUI elements for a field based on its type. If the field is an array, it will call the appropriate array drawing function.  Parameters: field - The FieldInfo object representing the field to be drawn.  label - A boolean indicating whether a label should be drawn for the field. Defaults to true.

DrawArrayField
private void DrawArrayField(
FieldInfo field
)

Draws the GUI elements for an array field based on its rank (1D or 2D).  Parameters: field - The FieldInfo object representing the array field to be drawn.

CreateLuaScriptFile
public virtual bool CreateLuaScriptFile()

Creates a Lua script file based on the current state of the object.

Returns

true if the file was successfully created or overwritten, false otherwise.

OpenLUAFile
public virtual void OpenLUAFile()

Opens the Lua script file associated with the object in the Unity editor.

GetLuaFillFieldValues
protected object[] GetLuaFillFieldValues()

Retrieves the values of fields marked with the LuaFillAttribute.

Returns

An array of objects containing the values of the fields.

)

private string GetLuaTableTemplate()

Builds the template to be used for the Lua script file.

Returns
